name: Horse Reality: Vanilla Darkmode
description: Public vanilla darkmode for Horse Reality servers. Version 1.1.4
additional_info:
CHANGELOG (1.1.4):
-Messages
    -ADDED style to the received/sent message list
        
-Forums
    -ADDED style to the Ideas forum support voting

----------------------------------------------------------

HOTFIXES (1.1.2 & 1.1.3):
-Half of owned horses were not being highlighted
-Some images, such as the moderator watermark for forums, were not showing up

----------------------------------------------------------

CHANGELOG (1.1.1):
-ADDED/TESTING option to toggle scrollbar on/off when downloading.

-Horse Profile
    -FIXED energy bar text colours (Lighter)
    -FIXED pedigree text colours (Lighter)

-Breeding page
    -ADDED theme to breeding page
    -FIXED red text appearing where it shouldn't
    
-Homepage
    -ADDED style to homepage
    
-Footer Changes
    -ADDED style to Rules page
    -ADDED style to Terms of Use page
    -ADDED style to Contact page
    
-Competitions/Conformation Shows
    -FIXED owned horses in Shows & Competitions not being highlighted
    
-Stable and Store Blocks
    -ADDED unselected tab colours

----------------------------------------------------------

TO DO:
-Change hover colours at shows & comps, and anywhere else found.

-Add compatibility to colours that users can use on profiles and forums
    -POSTPONED until updates to editor are finished.

-Change pages seen when logged out

-Homepage and Footer Links
    -Needs to be done: Fix horse images bleeding off these pages

-Edit to make truer "vanilla" experience
    -Unhide boxes made "transparent"
    -Unhide borders
    -Allow backdrop to change to different continents
    
-Change images to darkened edits for things that cannot be changed
through style alone.
    
-Add [Redacted] and [Redacted] if possible

-Roll like a buffalo
